name: nested
description: Demonstration of loading nested remote components: 'app1' (host) async loads 'ButtonContainer' from 'app2', which in turn async loads 'Button' from 'app3'.

scripts.e2e:ci: pnpm start & wait-on http-get://localhost:3001/ && npx cypress run --config-file ../cypress-e2e/config/cypress.config.ts --config '{"supportFile": "../cypress-e2e/support/e2e.ts"}' --spec "./e2e/runAll.cy.ts" --browser=chrome
